about_the_game:
Dress to kill! A "Teddy Bear" helmet is a cozy and stylish protection. Your friends will envy you and zombies will try to eat your brain... oh, they always do anyway!
Bear it with pride!
This DLC contains: A "Teddy Bear" Helmet.
detailed_description:
Dress to kill! A "Teddy Bear" helmet is a cozy and stylish protection. Your friends will envy you and zombies will try to eat your brain... oh, they always do anyway!
Bear it with pride!
This DLC contains: A "Teddy Bear" Helmet.

name: How To Survive 2 - Teddy Bear Helmet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200 series - DirectX 11 compatible
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

short_description: Dress to kill! A "Teddy Bear" helmet is a cozy and stylish protection. Your friends will envy you and zombies will try to eat your brain... oh, they always do anyway! Bear it with pride!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
